text: I'm married to the theater but my mistress is the films.
author: Oskar Werner

text: I don't think you should feel about a film. You should feel about a woman, not a movie. You can't kiss a movie.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

text: If you don't like my movies, don't watch them.
author: Dario Argento

text: There's an electrical thing about movies.
author: Oliver Stone
